title: Stephen King's 10 Best Stories for Thanksgiving (Patreon Clip)
itunes:title: Stephen King's 10 Best Stories for Thanksgiving (Patreon Clip)
itunes:subtitle: Here's a preview of our latest Patreon-exclusive episode in which the Losers give thanks to Stephen King by naming 10 titles of his that we should all be carving into each Thanksgiving season. Joining them at the table are special guests Jason Pel...
description:
Here's a preview of our latest Patreon-exclusive episode in which the Losers give thanks to Stephen King by naming 10 titles of his that we should all be carving into each Thanksgiving season. Joining them at the table are special guests Jason Pellegrini and Janelle Janson. Want more? Head on over to www.patreon.com/thebarrens and become a Librarian for more exclusive bonus content.


Follow us on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
